posts.body:
>>9fc4b671-f38b-4e57-9e46-92e6a1cc261a
>but I have some QoL things to implement this weekend and this is on the list.
In my opinion you should focus on auditing and signing improvements made by other people. If you have ideas you can delegate them, since many people can make posters, design things or write software, and I'm sure people will listen to you given that you are the owner. But you are the only one who can update the site, so that is an obvious bottleneck.
People can't read minds, so if you don't say what you intend to do before you do it then nobody can help you get it done.
